@_Genevievejay cancel all of our flights to/from MNL. With immediate effect, we announced special ticketing guidelines for the Philippines to waive the refund or rebooking charge of our passeners who are being affected. You may check here for details: https://t.co/GXpEzg18w2 (2/2)-Liz

@_Genevievejay Hi there, apologies for the wait as we are experiencing high volumes right now. Since Philippine citizens and permanent residents are permitted to enter the Philippines while Non-Philippine citizens may continue to travel from the Philippines as normal, we did not (1/2)

data.text: @tanzanitebluee Hi there, apologies for the wait as we are experiencing high volumes right now.  As team received a large volume of refund request, it may take longer time as usual. The refund process may takes around 6-8 weeks. We appreciate your patience. Thank you! - Liz

data.text: @YGENMAG Hi there, yes our inflight service remains unchanged on CX888

@bobofishee Hi there, you may find more information here. 
https://t.co/uENOmHnKtf
and our special ticketing guideline for mainland China
https://t.co/rKIP9DnKek
@Ponte33 Hi there, you may check the latest flight status here https://t.co/rF3qjrULNM
@jalalkazim Hi Jalal, could you please DM us your full name, 13 digit e-ticket number or 6-digit booking reference for checking?

[2 of 2] If your ticket was not booked on https://t.co/wa5i1yhkCZ or via our  Reservations team, please contact your travel agent directly for assistance.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

[1 of 2] In light of the novel coronavirus outbreak, we have implemented a no. of Special ticketing guidelines.  

With extended waiting times due to a high volume of incoming msgs, pls visit https://t.co/XHCKu3OJYn for info incl. flight status before reaching out to us.
